data.eml:eml: A redescription of Lophostica mauriciana Simon, 1902 (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wesołowska, Wanda (2000): A redescription of Lophostica mauriciana Simon, 1902 (Araneae: Salticidae). Genus 11: 95-98
